itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Green Crystals found near Rhutum Outstation.

item.name: Rough Green Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Green Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Rhutum Outstation.

item.name: Zereth Helmet
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: [Valkyrie] Garner Traveling Players Costume
item.desc:
A clown costume used by the Garner Traveling Players. It has a peculiar charm to it.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same item with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.desc: An accessory made of Green Crystal. Those who want to become rich carry this as a charm.

item.name: Zereth Shoe of Agility
item.desc: Energy of agility is contained within this Zereth Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Zereth Shoes of Agility, Zereth Shoes

item.desc: Zereth Shoes with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Zereth Shoes

item.name: Grade 2 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 2nd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.
